allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add file storage and hyperlink capabilities to meetings

- Add documents and links JSON fields to Meeting model
- Create upload API route for meeting documents
- Create download API route with presigned URLs
- Add server actions for document/link CRUD operations
- Create MeetingDocumentManager component for file uploads
- Create MeetingLinkManager component for external links
- Update ScheduleMeetingForm with attachments section
- Support initial documents and links on meeting creation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(gh pr create --base main --head CODEXCLI --title "feat: add document preview feature to view files in browser" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- Add inline content disposition option to storage client for previewing documents in browser
- Add `?preview=true` query parameter support to document download API routes
- Add "View" button with Eye icon to deliverable and meeting document managers

## Test plan
- [ ] Upload a PDF document to a deliverable
- [ ] Click "View" button and verify it opens in a new tab instead of downloading
- [ ] Click "Download" button and verify it still triggers a download
- [ ] Test the same flow for meeting documents

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)
EOF
\)")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 3000,3001,3002,3003,3004 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess | Sort-Object -Unique | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_-Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }")

Bash(1 <<'EOF'
SELECT 
  id,
  email, 
  name, 
  role,
  "isAdmin",
  "createdAt"
FROM "User"
ORDER BY "createdAt" DESC
LIMIT 10;
EOF)
